title: Cleveland Browns claim Don Jones
text:
Cleveland Browns claim Don Jones 0 comments 
Don Jones didn’t stay out of work for long. Fewer than 24 hours after his release from the New Orleans Saints, the third-year veteran safety from Town Creek was signed by the Cleveland Browns on Wednesday. 
Jones, who starred at Hazlewood High before playing running back then defensive back at Arkansas State, opened training camp in July with the Miami Dolphins. He was released on the team’s final cutdown in August and was signed to the Saints’ practice squad Sept. 7. Three days later, he was added to the 53-man roster. He played five games and recorded a special teams tackle for the Saints. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety.
